note.p: Servant. Employed by Sarah Elizabeth (Sarah) Wedgwood in Maer, 1841; her footman and groom in Down, 1851. Married his fellow servant, Sarah Morrey (1817/18–60), in 1857. Married Sarah’s sister and fellow servant Martha Morrey (1820–94) in 1861. Retired to Chorlton, Staffordshire.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/989/4/2a/3/15), 1851 (HO107/1606/246/3), 1871 (RG10/2830/17/6)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 August 2016)
London, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1921 (Ancestry.com, accessed 17 March 2017
